website_summaries.verdict: When it comes to quality build imbued with a touch of comfort, the Merrell Parkway Emboss Lace does not disappoint. Many have lauded the pair as being excellent shoes to wear daily due to its lightness and the superb material used to make this happen.The shoes are not waterproof though, something that many find a nuisance since the upper is made of leather. This problem can be easily solved though with a quick waxing of the shoes' leather. With a minimalist silhouette, a pair of Merrell Parkway Emboss Lace is a good addition to anyone’s sneaker collection.
pros: A good number of buyers thought that the Merrell Parkway Emboss Lace has a great design to it
More than one reviewer commended the comfort they felt when they wore the shoes
The minimalist look the shoes have is something most wearers like
One buyer ended up buying two pairs since he loved the shoes
Many were quick to point out the quality build of the Merrell Parkway Emboss Lace
A good number of sneakerheads enthused about the true to size fit of the Merrell Parkway Emboss Lace low tops
This shoe is lightweight, others noted
cons: One wearer was quick to point out that the shoes were a little snug if worn with thick socks
A few buyers expressed disappointment at the shoes not being waterproof

customer_reviews.title: Almost as good as the tough gloves
customer_reviews.text: I tried these as my preferred tough glove shoes (I've had and loved three pairs) are no longer available. They are a touch stiffer, but not too much, and are a suede leather rather than the tanned leather of my previous shoes. However, they are wonderfully comfortable, and I find I quite like the new 'intergrated' toungue. The tread is more aggressive, and will probably last longer. I would still prefer the old shoes, but these are still very good.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Possibly the best smart casual shoes I have worn!
customer_reviews.text: I find walking in these an absolute joy, being able to feel the ground with the minimalist sole helps me transition smoothly from one step to another. The Vibram sole provides excellent grip and I have yet to slip. The laces stay fixed with just a single knot unlike many others I have used. I did get them waterproofed however as they may not be suitable in very heavy rain, however they got a lot of testing the week I got them walking 20,000 steps a day in Edinburgh during Autumn with lots of rain and my feet did not get wet at all. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and robust trainer
customer_reviews.text: Knowing that Merrell sizing is slightly smaller than some I ordered a 1/2 size larger which turned out perfectly. I am a uk 10 EU 44) and these were an EU 45 which fitted me exactly. The trainers are superbly comfortable and provide lots of foot support. With the Vibram mid-sole they provide lots of support for the sole of your feet too for a thin trainer. They are a quality pair of shoes and having worn them for a few months they haven't disappointed. The styling is different and may not be everyone's taste but I like them because they are different. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Novamentus

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable, great to walk in.
customer_reviews.text: My new favourite casual shoes. I love the fit and feel of Merrell Vibram shoes, I already have some trail running ones and wanted some leather ones. Nice and wide in the forefoot, provides arch support, light and comfortable. Look at the styling, the tongue only opens on one side and the lacing is asymmetrical. There is a little stretchy band inside to help hold the shape which you can catch a little toe in. Anyway, I like the ‘barefoot’, no heel feel and the sole is grippy. I enjoy walking in these. I just wish there was a wider range for casual and maybe even smart wear.
customer_reviews.author: singlereed

customer_reviews.title: Careful with choosing a size
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the first pair as they were too small despite being the same size as other Merrel shoes that I had. Quick and speedy return service from Amazon, and then ordered this pair a whole size (i.e. not a half size) larger, which fit perfectly. Comfortable fit with the Barefoot approach.
customer_reviews.author: sp

customer_reviews.title: Lovely minimal leather shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These are now everyday shoes to sit with my Vibram 5-finger flyweights. Very neat and foot-shaped. The sole is a bit stiffer and more insulating but still with good feel. Fine for walking but they want to run! They are like a second skin, but if like me you have skinny feet you may need to find the right thickness of socks or a plain insole. The Nubuck uppers seem to work well with Nikwax so I expect them to be long-term waterproof and remain smartish. The real problem with these shoes is that no retailer seems to stock them so it's a case of buy and return if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look great, but....
customer_reviews.text: Loved these Merrell's to start with. Very comfortable and look great. Perfect for summer. Unfortunately after just 8 weeks and only a dozen outings in them i noticed that the sole is coming away on the right shoe. Very disappointed... Hoping that i can get a replacement pair sorted as i have worn Merrell footwear for years and these are the first pair to let me down.
customer_reviews.author: MISS C E STUBBS

customer_reviews.title: Great if used correctly
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy. Feel like water shoes and soles are not very thick so can feel uneven surfaces through but worn and used correctly they are excellent and look good too. Material is suede style but wipes clean.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Lack of support on the heel area.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are quite nice and easy to wear, comfortable and light. But the sole under the heel is too narrow and causes an awkward feeling that is pushing the foot inwards. I decided to return and try another models.
customer_reviews.author: FamaPT

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING SHOE DESIGN
customer_reviews.text: Merrell have done it again! Forget the overpriced and flimsy Vivo Barefoot shoes. Merrell is the real deal. These are gorgeous and comfortable and judging by the previous versions of this design, should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Otis L.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant fit, great colour and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Was in two minds about ordering, but after a day or so I did. I read some other reviews about ordering a size up, but just went for my normal UK 9. They fit perfectly, and are so light and comfortable (whilst still being sturdy enough), that they feel like carpet slippers when wearing! The Castle rock colour is also nice, perfect with jeans. I'm so glad that I ordered, I am now trying to find / order another pair! Well done Merrell, well happy!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Schofield

customer_reviews.title: Stiffer and more waterproof than Trail Glove.
customer_reviews.text: Just like Merrell Trail Glove but made from leather. As a result is stiffer and feels a little more restrictive. Still an excellent shoe, very well made!
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and light
customer_reviews.text: A very comfortable and lightweight training shoe. Soft, supple leather, can be worn with or without socks. Good quality vibram sole with excellent grip.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard1000

customer_reviews.title: No foot support
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. No arch support at all and little other foot support. Glue visible on some of the seams and others opening before I've even worn them. Merrell used to make good quality shoes but these are shocking.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Merrell’s go on and on.
customer_reviews.text: Through experience you cannot go wrong with Merrell. They are always comfortable and feel nice to wear. I brought these shoes as a replaced for my old pair of Merrells but the old ones are still going so I haven’t really tried these out yet.
customer_reviews.author: darula

customer_reviews.title: Lacks cushioning
customer_reviews.text: Nice design and comfortable at first however after a few days wearing them you start feeling the lack of cushioning and may end up with achy/tired feet. Also the size was too small for me.
customer_reviews.author: ferràn

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: They have a novel tongue in the shoe that is open on one side only. Very light and comfortable for walking around town or on grass. Not designed for rougher ground.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good so far. The laces could be better though. Other than that i am a fan of merrell.
customer_reviews.author: Marios Tziarris

customer_reviews.title: half a size too small (ordered 45 but need 46)
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Trail Glove 4 18 months ago and it fits fine (45). I wanted a slightly tougher shoe so looked at the Parkway. It looks like this Parkway is built on the Trail Glove last so I ordered a size 45. It's a bit small. Possibly because the toe cap is a bit less flexible with thicker material.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Have become my favourite pair of shoes. Very comfortable and good looking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Brunogn

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use for hiking. Just finished a 10 mile walk across challenging terrain and they were great. Grip even on stones on a stream bed was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, practical and versitle.
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable and versitle all round shoes. Ideal for mid range walks and even just for everyday use. These shoes offer a brilliant barefoot experience offering some tred and protection with out the cumbersome thick heels other shoes. When I walk in them I can feel more of the ground and more in control.
customer_reviews.author: Crocodile Aberdeen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not black!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and fit well, having learned previously to order a size up from U.K. only slight disappointment was the colour; ordered black as illustrated in the ad, but on arrival are nearer to a petrol colour, and definitely not even close to being black.
customer_reviews.author: chris plumstead

customer_reviews.title: Bad stitching inside the shoe
customer_reviews.text: Has got bumps inside with the stitching and a elastic band inside the shoe which is bizarre dont know what’s its purpose is. U keep feeling it on ur feet very irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Nikhil Anjarlekar

customer_reviews.title: good value for money
customer_reviews.text: product as described in the website. good delivery time and good value for money
customer_reviews.author: PEDRO P. CARDSO

customer_reviews.title: design not suitable
customer_reviews.text: style not obvious from website. have had many Merrell shoes but this pair was not suitable
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: love them!
customer_reviews.text: I am usually 7 with merrells these ones had to be 7.5 soft leather, comfy, minimal, barefoot shoes. I wish they were water repellent
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Nice trainers/shoes
customer_reviews.text: Confy and nice, I thought they would be bigger for the picture looks slily taller but they are good looking anyway and the good thing is they dont look "fat" on your feet. I reccomend althoug the price is slily high for them but anyway a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vinicius picciani

customer_reviews.title: Couloir not as stayed
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable shoes called black on the boxnactual colour green very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Auld Yin

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Too wide on the toe area, don’t look great on, look like wet suit booties
customer_reviews.author: Will M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and light weight, flexible sole as hoped for, but not quite as grippy as expected
customer_reviews.author: Felix W Maddison

customer_reviews.title: Check the colour before wearing
customer_reviews.text: Colour one olive one sandy brown ? Worn a few times before it was embarrassingly pointed out .....
customer_reviews.author: Rockrepublic

customer_reviews.title: Trusty Merrells as expected. Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes that are very light and comfortable. Feels like I’m not wearing shoes. I always buy Merrells and have had the sprint blast until now, but I think these are better.
customer_reviews.author: JRogalski

customer_reviews.title: Size is a litle under
customer_reviews.text: Normally I wear 43, but for this, I should have bought the 43,5 or 44.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Baptista

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with them, stylish, light and comfortable. Colour was a sort of bluish black rather than a true black.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fitted brill felt comfortable delivered two days early could have been notified.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods
customer_reviews.text: The shoes arrived with the eyelet for the laces ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoe
customer_reviews.text: So comfy on your feet they feel like they are a part of you.
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ok but one shoes are a bit snug if you are a UK 11 get a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Shaw

product_meta.title: Merrell Men's Parkway Emboss Lace Trainers
product_meta.description: Explore fearlessly. With Merrell barefoot construction, full-grain leather upper, breathable mesh liner, and vibram sole, parkway moc gives you an honest feel for adventure. Full grain leather upper breathable mesh liner m select fresh antimicrobial agents reduces shoe odour integrated footbed eva midsole for stability and comfort Merrell barefoot construction is minimal yet protective for versatility outside.
feature_bullets: Full-Grain Leather - Comfortable and protective full-grain leather surrounds the upper.
Moisture Wicking - The surface of the material will wick moisture away efficiently and effectively.
Breathable - A breathable mesh liner will allow air in and out for constant ventilation.
M Select FRESH - Antimicrobial treatment prevents bad smells and odours from gathering.
Forefoot and Rearfoot Protection - Thick material covers the toes and heel for protection.
